pages.text: O popol observ your Lord Unu kre vi 1 kre el gxi its mate tiam stern 2 many hom women Vi regard DI whom vi jxur regard parents DI watching VI
Vi man orf their rightful properties Ne substitute mav por bon ne konsum their properties kombin them yours! This est gross injustice
Vi deem gxi bon orf vi marry their mothers - Vi marry 2 3 4. Vi tim lest vi igx unfair tiam vi est kontent nur unu aux ki vi jam hav. Additionally vi est tiel likely evit financial hardship
Vi don women their due dowries equitably. Ili volont forfeit anything tiam vi akcept gxi; gxi est rightfully yours
